articles.title: EU, Africa aim to resolve vaccine patent dispute by spring -EU chief - Reuters
articles.description: Europe and Africa will work together to resolve by spring a rich-versus-poor nation dispute over how to ensure fair distribution of COVID-19 vaccines and treatments, the head of the European Commission said on Friday.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, Feb 18 (Reuters) - Europe and Africa will work together to resolve by spring a rich-versus-poor nation dispute over how to ensure fair distribution of COVID-19 vaccines and treatments, the … [+1992 chars]

articles.author: Elijah Felice Rosales
articles.title: EU investors urged to buy green bonds - Philstar.com
articles.description: The government has called on investors from Europe  to  support the Philippines’ maiden offering of green bonds.
articles.content:
MANILA, Philippines — The government has called on investors from Europe  to  support the Philippines’ maiden offering of green bonds.

articles.title: US announces Abrams tanks for Poland as tensions with Russia escalate - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin announced on Friday the planned sale of 250 Abrams tanks to Poland, as Washington moves to strengthen the defenses of a key eastern European ally amid a mounting threat of war between neighbouring Ukraine and Russia.
articles.content: WARSAW, Feb 18 (Reuters) - U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin announced on Friday the planned sale of 250 Abrams tanks to Poland, as Washington moves to strengthen the defenses of a key eastern Euro… [+642 chars]
